errorGeneric.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.

errorUnauthed.error: You are unauthenticated, please log in and try again.

errorForbidden.error: You are not authorized to do that.

errorNotFound.error: That resource was not found. Please try again.

errorUserNotFound.error: A user with that email does not exist. Create an account to get started.

errorDuplicateName.error: Something already exists with that name. Please try again with a different name.
